title: Story Generator
description: A single-page application that generates creative stories based on user prompts with a clean, intuitive interface

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Primary interface for users to input prompts and view generated stories

ui_components: Header with application title and description
Prompt input area with text area and character counter
Story display area with scrollable content
Story controls section with copy and regenerate options
Example prompts section with clickable suggestions
Story metadata display (word count, generation time)
interactions: User types in prompt input field
User clicks Generate button to submit prompt
Loading state displays while story is being generated
Generated story appears in display area
User can copy story to clipboard
User can click example prompts to populate input
User can regenerate story with same prompt
Error handling for failed generation attempts
acceptance_criteria: Prompt input accepts text up to 500 characters
Generate button is disabled when prompt is empty or exceeds character limit
Generated stories display with proper formatting and readability
Copy to clipboard functionality works across all modern browsers
Example prompts load and display correctly
Error messages display clearly when generation fails
Loading state provides visual feedback during generation
Responsive design works on mobile and desktop devices
Story metadata displays accurate word count and generation time
